name: Zylun Staffing
overview: Zylun’s mission is to help small- and medium-sized enterprises take advantage of a highly skilled global workforce in a simple and cost effective way. We help companies flexibly hire a staff overseas comprised of developers, designers, Internet marketers, managers, and customer service representatives. Zylun takes pride in not only providing simple and effective services, but also ensuring dedicated employees to fit our clients’ exact needs. Our company allows you to maintain your focus on your business’ core competencies by providing you with an experienced offshore staff to handle your company’s administrative IT, design, SEO, data entry, and other needs. Unlike many offshore staffing firms, Zylun is an American owned and operated company headquartered at 210 North 1200 East, Suite 101, Lehi, Utah 84043, with American management heading its offshore operations. Zylun is your long-term partner in outsourcing.
